name: Sekishu no Koe
description:
「隻手声あり、その声を聞け」“The sound of one hand exists; listen to that sound.”

A monk, a ronin, and a gambler are unlikely companions brought together by fate to combat the chaos of medieval Japan. In this era of fantasy, spirituality, and warriors, they must rely on each other to overcome many great obstacles and learn more about themselves.

An Android APK file is also available if you want to try installing it on your Android device.
